channel.title: Malaysia on BenOnTrack
channel.description: Recent content in Malaysia on BenOnTrack

item.title: A glimpse to Malaysian food - the Ultimate experience!
item.description: When it comes to food, Malaysia is definitely THE gastronomic delight for any foodie !! Some people eat to live, while others live to eat.

item.title: Borneo - The Orang-outan sanctuary
item.description: After a few weeks in Malaysia and Australia, we took off to Borneo and its impressive wildlife, beaches and jungle !

item.title: Penang - The Pearl of the Orient
item.description: Penang The “Pearl of the Orient” is regarded as the food capital of Malaysia, but since 2012 George Town became famous for its Street Art.
